EmailTemplate.name: AccountSuspensionEmail_Archive
EmailTemplate.subject: MyAerospace Account Has Been Temporarily Suspended
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
MyAerospace Account Has Been Temporarily Suspended
Dear {!Portal_Honeywell_ID__c.ContactName__c},
Your Honeywell MyAerospace.com account was not revalidated within the revalidation window and for security reasons, your "{!Portal_Honeywell_ID__c.Name}" has been temporarily suspended from Honeywell MyAerospace.com
To re-validate your account, please login to the MyAerospace.com and follow the instructions provided.
Note:
This email is being sent from an unmonitored mailbox. If you need further assistance, please contact a customer support team member at:
1-800-601-3099 US / Canada (Toll Free) 1-602-365-3099 International Choose Option 7 (Web Support)
Thank You, Honeywell Aerospace Customer Support Team
